content: I think I'll go with Giannis Antetokounmpo, he's a beast on the court. By the way, I was impressed by Novak Djokovic's win over Daniil Medvedev in the Australian Open earlier today, what a dominant performance! Anyway, back to basketball, what are your thoughts on the Los Angeles Lakers this season? Do you think they have a good chance of making a deep playoff run?
